.entry-header
Contact
Contact Us
112 Oak Avenue, Anna Maria FL
+1 941-778-1503
+1 800-778-2030
Directions to Anna Maria Beach Cottages from I-75
Exit SR 64 West. Drive approximately 12 miles to the end of SR 64 (Manatee Avenue) and turn right on Gulf Drive. Turn right at the first traffic light onto Marina Drive. Proceed north past Haley’s Motel on the left and CrossPointe Fellowship on the right. Oak Avenue is the 5th street on the left after Haley’s Motel. The Anna Maria Beach Cottages are located on the right side of Oak Avenue. Follow the walkway to the Office, which is located behind Cottage 112.
.entry-content .clear

.entry-header
About Us
Welcome to Anna Maria Beach Cottages
Our historic cottages date back to the 1940’s and are located at the desirable north end of Anna Maria Island, Florida.  An hour south of Tampa our cozy cottages preserve the charm of yesteryear but with all the modern conveniences.  We are truly a place to relax and get away from it all.
Located strategically for day trips to Orlando and Tampa theme parks, Zoos, water parks professional sporting events, and major shopping yet you can also go boating, sailing, fishing.  Travel easily to many interior state parks located on crystal clear springs and rivers for a lazy afternoon float.  Lively nightlife can be found in either Sarasota or Tampa. Gourmet restaurants abound, galleries and quaint beach shops are a stroll, bike ride or Island Trolley ride away.
The cottages range from studios to a 3-bedroom house. The large ADA accessible first floor studio faces the pool. The fully-renovated cottages offer guests a heated pool for a refreshing swim, a grill area with picnic tables for your family cookout, a guest laundry and bikes for a leisurely ride around the island.  The cottages also provide beach chairs and umbrellas. Bring your beach towel … we have everything else to make your holiday memorable and are ideally set up for group gatherings, weddings, family reunions and as well as a quiet weekend getaway with your special someone. No high-rises here, just peace, privacy and sunshine.
Reserve your memories today!

Bring your beach towel … we have everything else to make your holiday memorable.
